# Orb of Storms
## Overview
**Aura** strong varied; **CL** 18th

**Slot** â€”

**Price** 48,000 gp

**Weight** 6 lbs.

**Description**

This glass sphere is 8 inches in diameter. The possessor can call forth all manner of weather, even supernaturally destructive storms. Once per day, she can call upon the orb to use a *[[Control Weather (Spell)|control weather]]* spell. Once per month, she can conjure a *[[Storm of Vengeance (Spell)|storm of vengeance]]*. The possessor of the orb is continually protected by an *[[Endure Elements (Spell)|endure elements]]* effect.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Control Weather (Spell)|control weather]], [[Endure Elements (Spell)|endure elements]], [[Storm of Vengeance (Spell)|storm of vengeance]]*

**Cost** 24,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 524
